thread.title: Jack Dorsey's Square grew revenue more than 20 percent and the stock is jumping - Business Insider
thread.title_full: Jack Dorsey's Square grew revenue more than 20 percent and the stock is jumping - Business Insider

author: Reuters
title: Jack Dorsey's Square grew revenue more than 20 percent and the stock is jumping - Business Insider
text:
print Jack Dorsey Bill Pugliano/Getty Images 
Square, the mobile payments company co-founded and run by Twitter Chief Executive Jack Dorsey, reported a 20.7 percent jump in quarterly revenue as it processed more payments. 
Net loss attributable to common stockholders narrowed to $15.17 million, or 4 cents per share, in the fourth quarter ended Dec. 31, from $80.5 million, or 34 cents per share, a year earlier. 
Square's net revenue rose to $451.9 million from $374.4 million. 
The company facilitates payments between businesses and customers by using a credit card reader that turns any mobile phone into a payment terminal. 
The company's shares were up 5 percent in after-market trading on Wednesday. EXCLUSIVE FREE REPORT: 5 Top Fintech Predictions by the BI Intelligence Research Team. Get the Report Now Â» Read the original article on Reuters . Copyright 2017. Follow Reuters on Twitter . More from Reuters:
